column1: “Welcome my child... you’ve almost made it to the end; but there’s a challenge; should you choose to accept it. But of course; there’s a reward upon completion...
This optional quest consists of battling ghosts with 3 different personalities; it will be tough but you will be given a reward that will prepare you for the final battle.
The reward is a special pendant that gives you powers. A pendant made from killing one of the three ghosts. However; you must choose carefully which ghost you kill to get your desired pendant.
Choose your pendant wisely... He he he...
Here is your reward. A powerful pendant for the young wizard... I wish you luck in your journey... he he
